text:
Your shuttle goes down into the planet and towards the Grandmaster’s house. As you enter his residence, you realize he kind of has all the power here.
You don’t get a lot of time to think about it as the moment you’re in his room, you find yourself on your knees giving an enthusiastic service to the master of this planet.
"Good one,seems you know your place slut." Ast smirks full of unbridled confidence "How does it feel to choke on my fat cock?"
He finishes the quickie and sends you back.
Atleast you got your supplies
"Your loss"

Ast reappears on the monitor "Yes, Captain, at your service what do you want?" He seems oddly tired.

OR

The comms resolve to show Ast doing a complicated manouver as he jumps over his desk to make a entrance. "Channel clear, go ahead."

As the secretary passes you over to Ast’s personal comms, you manage to see that the Grandmaster has installed an emergency failsafe, that would force throught and allow you see audio and video. Should you press it?

Sure, but I am topping, no other positions have been implemented.

"So no more supplies for a bit"

"Hi, it is me Ocp, the Bluemoon Shipyards Designer"

You are known by the Order Grandmaster itself,  $theFaction recognizes you as a charitable soul, high-level officials are looking to network with a condecorated hero of the States. You are given much leeway, and may receive trade concessions and access to high-quality ships and munitions.
You're relatively well-known within $theFaction, whether in person or by reputation. Most members of the Order will come to your aid, as a fellow spacer.
You have a benefactor in $theFaction, seeing how much you have done in their stead. Harassing you is therefore a more risky endeavor for local patrol commanders.

The $faction officials tend to view you favorably, though this has little in the way of implications. At best, you might be sold some low-grade surplus military equipment, or avoid being the target of an investigation if a more convenient scapegoat is available.
You're not generally well known by $faction officials, for good or ill.

Though nothing has been proven (yet), $faction officials tend to view you with distrust. Link access to the port authority is granted only grudgingly, and you find yourself the subject of investigations and harassment frequently.
Suspicions have risen to an actionable level. The Knights are keeping a good eye on you, $faction ports will be closed to your ilk, and patrols look to prevent your mischievious plans.

$Faction commanders have authorization to engage your fleet on sight, and all markets are prohibited from trading with you. The Knights have posted a caution phamplet for travelers with your face and name in bold red.

You can find a holo of your face with clown makeup and somebody giving you a wedgie in almost every planet, doctored for sure. Ast has actually taken note of much of a jerk you are, so he is a bit dissapointed. The Order has a private betting ring going for who gets your head.
"You’re in the presence of the Glorious leader of the Oda Empire, what do you desire, mortal?"

text:
You go into your shuttle as Oda sends to signal to the Guard to allow you entry.
As you make it into the planet a disinterested Nobbu grabs your hand and pulls you towards the  Washi Castle that dominates the city from orbit. The exsperated Nobbu comes with you all the way towards the inner sanctum of the structure, where Nobunaga appears and pulls into her personal room, the last thing you see is the nobbu about to cry.
Retainer, cowardice is not a valor i endorse, but I will allow it"

You return to your space station, ready to go back to your spacer gig.
Oda refuses vehemently."No way, Oda serves nobody" She stops for a second. "You can serve me, you should think about it"
"Stop it, retainer"
The Nobu children write cards to your address on Nobu Day, and the State has created a memorandum to honor you as a War Hero. Nobu’s on the street organize events to see your fleet battles live.

Your fanboy is relatively well-known within $theFaction, whether in person or by reputation. Most members of$theFaction  have joined together his achievements and yours, making you a hero in the eyes of the Nobu.

A young $theFaction officer has taken a liking to you, making modifications to his nobu cosplay to be closer to your image. It makes sure that patrol commanders are not sure whenever it is you or the fanboy.

The $faction Nobu have started talking about your value as a reliable asset, some of them are willing to give you some extra leeway on the loot distrbution.This shows mostly as low-grade surplus military equipment, and pinning your crimes on a rival Nobu.
You're not generally well known by $faction officials, for good or ill.

Though nothing has been proven (yet), $faction officials tend to view you with distrust. Link access to the port authority is granted only grudgingly, and you find yourself the subject of investigations and harassment frequently.

Suspicions have risen to an actionable level. Nobus sneer and joke at your expense, some of the more spiteful ones make hand-crafted piñatas with your face. The Knights are keeping a good eye on you, $faction ports will be closed to your ilk, and patrols look to prevent your mischievious plans

$Faction commanders have authorization to engage your fleet on sight, Nobu’s have an industrial line set up for the production of pots bearing a resemblence to your second’s ass and another for bats in image of the Emperor Sword.

Once a foolish Nobu said the name of your flagship, he got burned at the stake, and his ashes stomped into the dirt.Nobu History nerds are stalking Nobu-pedia begging for the opportunity to change "is" to "was".
